version_description:
Animated PNG Support!  Convert animated PNGs into GIFs and save GIFs as animated PNG.
Import GIFs from a URL in your clipboard.
Other Bug Fixes.

+ Improved video trimming for creating GIFs from longer videos.
+ Adds ability to clear caches in Settings to free up space on your device.
+ Uses Tumblr-provided share popover.
Looks like we broke sharing to external services for new users.  This release fixes that.

Suppress sound in the video trim view (GIFs don't have sound, silly).
Update some old buttons and other UI tweaks for iPad.

Fix sharing to Pinterest app
Fix issue where clear cache was not removing all that it could

Improvements to photo picker:
1) Allow you to pick photos from your Favorites album
2) Detect GIFs in your photo library, and mark them as such

Better support for all devices from iPhone 4s to iPad Pro
Fix a crash when importing video

Added a few more stickers for you to choose from.
Address a few bugs and crashes.

Help out!  Sign up to be a beta tester.  Send an email to support@5secondsapp.com!

* Improves GIF quality when creating GIFs from photos.
* Numerous other minor fixes to reduce crashing.

-+- Want to beta test?  Email support@5secondsapp.com

* Fix bug in clear cache that would prevent cache removal from working
* Fix bug when importing live photos from iCloud
* Importing photos from library will display a frame number on selection

- When creating GIFs from photos, we no longer crop the GIF.  Instead, it is resized and scaled on a transparent canvas!
- Fix issue where gallery would not update after importing GIF from photo library
- Add portrait crop ratios (2:3, 3:4)
- Numerous other fixes and tweaks

If you have feedback, or if stuff isn't working, please email support@5secondsapp.com.  Leave a review if you like the app.  You can also join the beta testing program by sending an email to support@5secondsapp.com!

Just some boring old bug fixes in this one - centered around trimming video.

If you have feedback, or if stuff isn't working, please email support@5secondsapp.com.  Leave a review if you like the app.  You can also join the beta testing program by sending an email to support@5secondsapp.com!

KNOWN ISSUES IN iOS 10.  FIX IS SUBMITTED TO APPLE.

Fix crash when importing video.
Fix issue where adding a frame to a GIF resulted in an incorrectly cropped frame.
Increase maximum dimension of created GIFs.
Fix import sticker on iPad.
Other minor fixes.
Minor fixes and enhancements for iOS 10.

-+- Fixes crash on "Take Video" for new users.
-+- Minor fixes and enhancements for iOS 10.

Please email support@5secondsapp.com with any crashes / issues / suggestions!

THIS VERSION DOES NOT WORK IN iOS 8 - FIX IS COMING.
* 3D Touch 5SecondsApp Icon for quick GIF shortcuts
* Crash bashing / Bug fixing
Fix crash when launching app in iOS 8.

* iMessage App included (iOS 10)
* Select a range of frames when editing (hint: long press on the frame to start)
* Numerous minor tweaks and fixes

* Fix "reverse GIF"
* Other bug fixes

When working with the individual frames of a GIF:
* Fix re-arrange frames.  When no frames are selected, you can tap and hold on a frame and then move it where you want.
* Change multi-select frames.  When a frame is selected, tap and hold on another frame to select all frames between.

Also, the usual bug fixes.
Trying to fix a specific crash that happens when importing video from your library.

- Add confirm on delete of GIFs
- Minor bug fixes

You can  now import GIFs into 5SecondsApp with the iOS Share Extension.

Want to help out?  Join our beta testing team - email support@5secondsapp.com.

Faster performance when you have lots of GIFs.
Upgrade Dropbox SDK.

- When exporting a GIF to an MP4 video, you can specify how many loops you want output.
- Remember selected font on GIF annotation
- Minor fixes
This is primarily a bug fix and iOS 11 refresh.  Fixed many user-reported bugs.  Join our beta program so you can get early access to the next release!  Email support@5secondsapp.com!

Mainly bug fixes: 
* Fix bug in GIF to MP4 conversion.
* Fix slow-motion video to GIF import.
* Fix issue where save GIF to photo album crashes app.
* New interface for sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

* Support for iCloud Drive.  
* UI Enhancements.

-+- Fix the speed slider for older iOS versions.
-+- New status indictor.

Fix bug when searching Giphy with multiple words.
Fix bug where the color selector does not dismiss when inserting a blank frame into a GIF.
Fix other minor bugs.

* Do you have a lot of GIFs?  You can now add a tags to a GIF and then filter the Gallery by a tag.
* Giphy search results looking stale?  Tap the refresh button to reload.
* No longer does the app cache thumbnails in memory for all the GIFs, which should speed things up.
* The usual bug bashing.

2.1.8 -
* Fix issue where user can not save after cropping.  Whoops!

2.1.7 -
* Do you have a lot of GIFs?  You can now add a tags to a GIF and then filter the Gallery by a tag.
* Giphy search results looking stale?  Tap the refresh button to reload.
* No longer does the app cache thumbnails in memory for all the GIFs, which should speed things up.
* The usual bug bashing.

Add shading to annotation text shadow
You can now swipe up on the status card when it appears from the top
Lock orientation changes when progress indicator is presented
Fix issue where frame turns black when reordering frames
Address crash on mp4 export
Minor UI Changes
* Fix potential crash when sending GIFs via text message
* Fix issue where displayed thumbnails are incorrect in gallery view.

* Control GIF playback by touching and holding a GIF during playback, then swipe left and right.
* Change the text shadow location when adding text to a GIF.
* The usual bug fixes.

As always, thanks for trying 5SecondsApp!

* We broke filter and crop in the last release - fixed it.
* Control GIF playback by touching and holding a GIF during playback, then swipe left and right.
* Change the text shadow location when adding text to a GIF.
* The usual bug fixes.

As always, thanks for trying 5SecondsApp!

Long tap on a GIF in the gallery view to select it.
Tap to dismiss the white notification banner.
Minor bugs fixes.

When adding effects to a GIF, the preview is now live.
Fix the preview when cropping a GIF.
The usual bug fixes.

Bug Fix to ensure changes made in the frame editor can be previewed.
Add Select All / Deselect All to frame editor.
Add a border around your GIF in the frame editor.
Swipe to next and previous GIF when viewing GIFs.
Just some minor bug fixes in this release.

When adding effects to a GIF, the preview is now live.
Fix the preview when cropping a GIF.
The usual bug fixes.

Long tap on a GIF in the gallery view to select it.
Tap to dismiss the white notification banner.
Minor bugs fixes.

Long overdue update that includes a new Stop Motion Capture feature as well as numerous bug fixes.

Stop Motion Capture allows you to create a GIF by taking photos within the app.  Try it out.

2.3.1
Found and fixed few more bugs - especially on the iPad

2.3.0
Long overdue update that includes a new Stop Motion Capture feature as well as numerous bug fixes.
Stop Motion Capture allows you to create a GIF by taking photos within the app.  Try it out.

The big update in this release is now you can export a GIF to a Live Photo.  You can also import GIFs from URLs from the clipboard (again) - so if you copy a link to a GIF, 5SecondsApp will download the GIF and save it.

GIFs are now limited to 50fps when editing.  There were problems when savings GIFs with higher frame rates.
All GIFs in the gallery are now available in the iMessage extension.
Improved the "add blank frame to GIF" feature.
Fix issue when saving all images of a GIF to the photo library.
Fix issue with password entry when password protection is enabled
Fix issue where, when selecting a tag, the GIFs do not reload
Fix issue where GIF gallery extends outside of safe viewing area

Bug fixes including:
Fix issue with MP4 and Live Photo export.
Fix issue when changing GIF playback frame rate.

Fixing issue where GIFs fail to share by URL.
Minor UI enhancements.

This release removes ads.  No more ads!
Add ability to tip developer because, you know, there are no more ads!
Fix issue when adding sticker to GIF.

- New interface for adding stickers and text to a GIF.
- The usual UI updates and bug fixes.

- Improved interface for adding stickers and text to a GIF.
- The usual updates and bug fixes.

Select and save multiple GIFs from the gallery.
Minor UI updates and code cleanup.
Fix some layout issues on iPad especially when multitasking.
